wikipedia_page.main: Peter Smith (born 31 October 1980) is an English former footballer, who played for Exeter City as a midfielder, and is currently assistant manager of Floriana. Peter has also had a spell playing in Finland for Rhiamaki Rips, represented England FA and coached at Liverpool FC Academy.
